Recommendations: 1. Strengthen the system of disseminating the VMGO by resorting to other avenues
2. Periodic in-service training and seminars on awareness and acceptability of the VMGO may be considered.
3. Survey/ research results in the level of participation in the formulation, review and revision of the VMGO could be quantified to be more meaningful.
4. Evidences on job performances of faculty and staff may be documented and presented
5. Explore other avenues in disseminating the VMGO beyond memorizing. This may include determining the levels of understanding/ comprehension, appreciation synthesis and evaluation.
